greetingText:
Everyone called you Amisha,
 But you are my MISH!!
wishText:
Every time I look into your eyes,
 I fall in love all over again
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4:
On your special day,
 I want you to know just how much you mean to me.
text4Adjective: You're my heart, my happiness, and the reason every day feels brighter.
text5Entry: The way you love, care, and bring joy into the my world is something I admire so deeply.
text5Content:
You are everything I ever hoped for and more.

 I love you endlessly....
outroText: You light up my days with your smile and fill my heart with love
